name: Vitract
description: Vitract offers highly-personalized holistic treatment plans for mental illness which focus on the treatment of the illness' underlying causes rather than its symptoms, using in-depth lab testing, and personalized dietary and lifestyle recommendations.
one_liner: Vitract offers highly-personalized holistic treatment plans for mental illness which focus on the treatment of the illness' underlying causes rather than its symptoms, using in-depth lab testing, and personalized dietary and lifestyle recommendations.
industry: Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability and wellness
